summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1679, for the improvement of Fifteenth Avenue Northwest, in the City of Seattle, from West Sixty-seventh Street to West Seventy-fifth Street, by constructing water mains therein of proper dimensions and material, together with all crosses, tees, fire hydrants and other appurtenances necessary for the proper fire protection and water service of said district, under Ordinance No. 17702 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
